snippet.title: Pocket Troops - Android Gameplay HD
snippet.description:
FOR MORE ANDROID GAMES -http://www.youtube.com/user/androidgameplaynet?sub_confirmation=1
Pocket Troops is the most feel-good war game ever. Recruit rookies, train them hard, equip with special skills and weapons. Your squad is ready? Step into the battle with millions of other player worldwide!
Battles happen in short and catchy sessions. It's a perfect bite-sized game to play in a traffic jam, when waiting for someone or yawning...
As the Commander of this clumsy brigade, your role is to recruit and train troopers one by one. Controlled by their own AI, they will fight and act in the way you train and equip them in HQ. Cross your fingers and cheer for your squad!
In the HQ you have everything you need:
- Exercisers in the Gym to pump iron and make Rockies out of your rookies
- Nobody dies in Pocket Troops: fish tank and top-notch Hospital equipment will help your troopers recover from any injuries
- Day Room upgrades to provide comfort and convenience to relax in between battles
- Cash Printing Device for those who have big spendings. Illegal? Nope, nobody told us that. It is just for pocket money
- Many other cool stuff
= FEATURES = 
- Upgrade and protect your Headquarters. Your Base. Your Fortress. Well, you got it...
- Recruit, train and command your own super trooper army
- Kick other Commanders' arses worldwide and gather the loot
- Stand against Evil, Professor Evil, and the army of his minions
- 12 challenging missions with unexpected storyline twists
- 6 unique trooper classes with awesome skills
- Large selection of weapons and equipment. Our favorites are Stone, Molotov Cocktail, Lewis Gun and Laser Rifle
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Download link - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Heyworks.PocketTroops
